Posts.Content: kiddy wrote: Hi everyone. I was diagnosed on August 11th with Stage 3a with 4 positive nodes. I am a triple negative as well. All I can think about is negative thoughts and am I going to die. I need support and prayers and need to hear back from you survivors to give me a ray of hope. Dx 8/11/2008, IDC, 1cm, Stage IIIA, Grade 2, 4/14 nodes, ER-/PR-, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: 4 posive nodes kiddy Diana4Rita

Posts.Content: Oct 14, 2008 04:37PM kiddy wrote: Hi Skyrat. So glad to hear you are cancer free. How did you cope with your dx? I am living in fear all the time. I can't even sleep. I feel I am consumed with dying.
Posts.Title: 4 posive nodes kiddy Diana4Rita
